categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Rancor's Wrath was a pseudonym that was adopted by a tall, slender, male individual who visited the bar Every Delight in Port Town on the planet Rodia in 0 BBY. The individual wore large amounts of make-up in order to conceal his identity and while in the bar, he acquainted himself with the holostar Javul Charn, who was similarly disguised and whom he knew only by the moniker "Night Cat." After Charn's security guards Dash Rendar and Eaden Vrill came to the bar in search of her, the individual confronted them and asked "Night Cat" whether the pair were bothering her.
